## Metadata

```{r}
dir.create(here("data"), recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)

metadata <- metadata %>%
  select(-starts_with("Season"),
    -starts_with("VacType"),
    -Prior_vac,
    -VACCOUNT,
    -FLU_EVR,
    -FLU_HOSP)

write_tsv(metadata, here("data", "02_meta_dat_clean.tsv"))
```
